product_name: Patagonia Reversible Tuhuata Bikini Top - Women's
long_description: When you want just the bare minimum at the beach, wear the triangle-style Patagonia Reversible Tuhuata Bikini Top with adjustable crossover ties that cinch for a secure fit. All-recycled nylon and spandex blend is soft yet durable. Reversible top lets you switch the color from day to day. Patagonia Reversible Tuhuata Bikini Top features crossover ties in a contrasting color.
short_description: When you want just the bare minimum at the beach, wear the triangle-style Patagonia Reversible Tuhuata Bikini Top with adjustable crossover ties that cinch for a secure fit.
